24 Frames

Ano: 2017

IMDb ID: tt6777170

Classificação: 6.8

Sinopse: What happens in the moments before and after a photograph is taken? 24 Frames answers this question and unites the two artistic languages Kiarostami dedicated his life to. Melancholic and joyous, serious and mischievous, it's a refined meditation on the passage of time and on the fragility of existence - themes central to the cinema of this revered Iranian director.—Anonymous
